name: Jasmin Ninjas
description:
Conquer the castle !

The Jasmin Ninjas need to get back their lands.

In this game, you will Fight from tile to tile until the enemy Castle.
You fill loose ninjas, but Reinforcement will come from neighbour Ninjas with the same colour as your tile.

If you liked this game, rate it, leave a comment to help me improve it,

Thanks
